p: Detailing how this senior colleague went from being a source of support and offering her prestigious speaking opportunities and fellowships to her harasser affords White male researchers (which I am) to consider the power structures that allow for those in positions of power to take advantage of those who are more vulnerable, and the needless destruction that the harasser inflicts upon the harassed. While her experience was not directly related to the climate crisis, Rush connects the vulnerability that she felt in these situations (and the needless pain it caused) to the vulnerability that faces those who face immense obstacles to leaving regions vulnerable to destruction caused by climate change.
